name: Protect the Candle
description:
Protect your candle from the candle blowing skulls!
How long will you last?

Controls:

Keyboard arrows: move your hand
Key Q: Swap between your left and right hand. (1s cooldown)
Key W: Use both hands. (7s cooldown)
Key E:  Restore a small portion of your candle. (30s cooldown)

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50. Theme: Delay the inevitable.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/protect-the-candle
